Tests that expressions have thrown objects.

setTimeout(throwError, 0); undefined
undefined
foo.js:14 Uncaught Error: error_text
    at throwError (foo.js:14:17)
throwError @ foo.js:14
setTimeout (async)
(anonymous) @ VM:1
throwError();

    at throwError (foo.js:14:17)
    at <anonymous>:1:1
throwError @ foo.js:14
(anonymous) @ VM:1
setTimeout(throwObject, 0); undefined

(anonymous) @ VM:1

(anonymous) @ VM:1

(anonymous) @ VM:1
